title: Thananana Thanthanaa Lyrics Vithagan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Swetha Mohan
Song: Thananana Thanthanaa
Lyrics: R Parthiban
Movie: Vithagan
Music Joshua Sridhar

Thananana Thanthanaa
indha tuniin vaarthai edhuvo
Thona thona endrennai
manam nacharipadheno
Ragasiyamaagave ennai naane paarpadhenno
o oh o oh o oh oh ...

Thananana Thanthanaa
indha tuniin vaarthai edhuvo
Thona thona endrennai
manam nacharipadheno
Ragasiyamaagave ennai naane paarpadhenno
yenno pudhidhaai pala kelvi mulaipadheno
o oh adada idhidhaan adhuvo..

Poovukkul pullarikkum punnagayai nee thoovaadhe
Kolaaru nee cool-aaga seiyaadhe
Kaal medhu kaal pottu imai kudaiyil nee amaraadhe
Thodhaaga neeyum sedhaaram seiyaadhe

Aasai kaattrin soroobam
Mundhaanai seendidum aavesam
Kaaval aayiram potta podhum
Tharai melum oorvalam dhaan kaadhal

Thananana Thanthanaa
indha tuniin vaarthai edhuvo
Thona thona endrennai
manam nacharipadheno
Ragasiyamaagave ennai naane paarpadhenno
